content.detailedDescription:
Taking dog outside in front yard
looked south east at radio tower saw to the right of it a pulsating red and white object
thought object was either a plane hovering or a planet 
didn't seem anything out of ordinary until it moved slowly to the west then darted horizontally to the east at a rapid pace
well above the tree lines which went out of eye sight in a matter of seconds
no sound no other objects in the sky
after witnessing this quickly went inside with dog
content.summary: Pulsating light stationary then moved slowly right then zoomed left

content.detailedDescription: no 1-19-2015 at 5.30am i went out whit dog to go  a rell rell bright light over head around 10.000 feet light stand rell bright for mine thin move off look like it went up hier in the sye
content.summary: rell  bright light   then bime light move away big it black out star win move away

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the sky because it looked like there was rainbow next to the sun. at the time i was taking pictures i did not see the object.. i have before and after pictures of object and you could not see the "object" with the naked eye; you could only see it in the photos. when i saw the object in my pictures i was syked at first like wow what's that.I have never had this happen before. it was like the object in the sky was going on this path; it started out away from the sun but as you look at the last couple photos,it s getting closer and closer to the sun. but when it got near the sun, it was like it disappeared;like it had gotten to its destination.
content.summary: Object in sky with purplish haze around it.

content.detailedDescription: I was aboard a military c-12 enroute from nas jax to navsta roosy rds @ 13hrs 3 jan 1983. i was a civilian employee of comnavairlant. first craft was @ about 1000ft headed nw, speed about 300knots.White domed disc no appendages nor any fin or wings. second craft appeared @ 1310hrs headed ne.Speed and discretion same as the first fraft. we were in the area of andros isl.
content.summary: Domed disc 1000 ft dia x 50ft depth at apex of dome. over atlantic, 2 ea.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking around the city with my father (since i live in a high place i can see a huge part of it from here), and even though it was already 6:00 pm at the time it was still almost as bright as a day can be (summer time), when he saw a strangely bright light in the sky and showed me, amazed. i tought it was just a star, but after some seconds i remind myself that stars don't stand below clouds, so it couldn't be one. we were thinking it was maybe a plane, but planes can't stand still. and an helicopter can't fly so high, but if it do fly so high they are not that silent. then, that light got just a little closer and bigger. looking closely, we noticed that was probably a metallic object reflecting sun light, and this is why it was shining through the blue sky. suddenly, it started moving around, and some very little shining objects came out of it, flying very fast but still in weird, curvy directions. this is when the main object got a red glow right below it, the star-like shine still being the main color though. then red became green. and green became just a blue that was brighter than the sky. at this moment, i tried to take a picture/film it, but i am pretty bad at cameras and the image got no focus, so the image was blur and we couldn't see the object. this repeated for about one minute, red to green, to blue, to red, and then it slowly went up away, through the clouds, and finally disappeared after fading away. we couldn't really understand what that was and stayed there for some time, waiting to see if it would come back, but nothing happened. in the end, looking at it made me dizzy, probably because of trying to see the little fast objects.
content.summary: Reflected sun-light, ejected small objects and changed a little light below it from red to green to blue.

content.detailedDescription: Object sighted ese of our home.  object is brilliant white.  when viewed through binoculars object appeared diamond shape with flashing red/blue lights.  object just appeared without any apparent source.  object did not move, sway, vary at any time during observation.  observation ended to come inside to make this report.
content.summary: While stargaze with my son watched bright strarlike object appear below orion when viewed through binoculars object appeared to flash red/blue  object didnt move or sway.  we were at home, 2 miles north of adrian, no and 5 miles west of hwy 71

content.detailedDescription: I was around seven yrs old and we were at home one evening, when my sisters started screaming about a spaceship in the sky.  i ran to the door to see, and saw one the most amazing things i've ever seen.  a very large ship was hovering in the sky only a few hundred feet above the ground and approx. 500 feet across a small field and a city street.  it reminded me of a huge simon says flashing in the sky!  we had time to grab the camera and try to snap some pictures of it, but it was too dark outside and the pictures didn't take.  we watched for several minutes as it hovered there directly across the street from our apartment.  i have seen other u.F.Os since then, but from much farther away standpoints.  that was an event i'll always remember!  awaesome!!!
content.summary: I was a kid and we all ran to the door to see a ship hovering about 300 ft. above ground at about a 500 ft. distance, flashing, and making a huge noise!  it had to be the size of a city block at least.  it hovered about 5 minutes then ascended!

content.detailedDescription: I wanted another proof of their existences (among dozens and dozens, i am a skeptic). so my innerbuddy summoned this magnificent photocron. and i just filmed and took pics.
content.summary: Its not a ufo, its an ifo, its a summoned photocron.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i was walking from the shop late tonight and heard a really loud buzzing sound coming from around us. we looked up and the sky has been fairly clear and 7 disk/dome shaped lights in a diamond formation stayed stationary in the sky. we stared as started asking ourselves what it could be, then after 2/3 minutes the buzzing became a loud jet-like sound with all lights in formation still steadily picking up speed moving across the sky, eventually after looking at them they quickly vanished after a few minutes and then was never seen again.

we were both very confused asking ourselves what it could be, we firstly presumed maybe a military training? maybe just planes flying together but we cant pinpoint what exactly it was. 

we lost sight of the objects when they moved across the sky and then into the distant clouds.
content.summary: 7 lights in formation still in the sky and slowly began to steadily move across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Playing disc golf at night (buck creek state park with other witnesses.  walking uphill hole 11.  the sky was very clear so we looked up to admire it's beauty when we noticed 1 starlike object moving overhead at a very high altitude(straight line movement).  i thought maybe a satellite when we saw another moving in a different direction.  others in group thought airplane but then we saw an airplane with typical signal lights at a lower altitude. clear sky no wind no sounds. we laughed about it and continued our game never looking up again.
content.summary: 2 starlike objects moving in different directions high altitude. airplane seen at lower altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
We are in southwest nm.   had family visiting for christmas and on the 25th got out to show them the piece of land we have.  took pictures of us showing the mountain in the background.   when viewing the pictures in our computer saw what appears to be a metallic object behind us in one of the pictures.
when we zoomed the picture in it looks like there is a square around it.

enclosed is for your review.

thank you, [name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: The picture shows a metallic oval shape object

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog around 7 pm cst, it was a very clear starry night. i was observing some stars, and all of a sudden a white or beige oval shaped or blimp shaped object flew across the sky (straight line) at a very fast speed no sound, no trail, no other witnesses (or at least i don't think so). i have seen a ufo before, so it wasn't extremely shocking or anything. but this thing came in fast and left fast.
content.summary: Blimp / oval shaped craft

content.detailedDescription:
Strange flying object, hovering about 500ft high. just over the woods on ribblers lane. very bright multicoloured lights. 

just walked out my front door and was almost blinded by the sheer amount of light, i thought the sun had relocated to infront of my house. i still feel confused by this sighting.
content.summary: Flying object, not sure what it was.

content.detailedDescription: We were at home my granddaughter walked out side  in a few minutes i walked out side to smoke when she called to to come to the back yard she said nanna what is that in the sky it was a big bright light bigger than any star i have ever  seen we watched it for a few minutes trying to see if it was moving towards us or away when i thought go get your i phone an get photo so i got it an came back by that time it had moved towards the west away from us an thr pecan trees  were blocking it so i only got 2 photos of it when i looked at them in zoom one had a cigar shape with a glow around it the other had a square shape with a glow around but both photos are of the same bright light
content.summary: Big bright light in the sky was biger than any star i have ever seen

content.detailedDescription: I had just came out of the local wal mart and got into my suv. i noticed something in the sky at my 2 o'clock. i thought it was an airplane because we have a local airport the flies people around sight seeing, but it was strange, it started to change. it was like a ribbon flapping in the breeze.It was coming towards me, then it reversed course and started going away from me. after a few seconds i could barely see it. next thing i know i could see it heading west but it wasn't flat it had become a sphere. that is then i staring recording with my phone. after a minute or so it disappered.
content.summary: Saw object after getting into my vehicle. at first it was long and thin like a ribbon, then morphed into sphere. that is when i started recording with cell phone.

content.detailedDescription:
This incident happened while i was in nm on business, and staying at the hayatt tamaya in santa ana pueblo. the time was about 7:05 pm and i was attracted by the beautiful sunset skies and wanted to take a photo to send to my wife, back in nc. i used an iphone 4s, and took several photos of the sky around the hotel.

at no time did i see the lights (objects?) that show up on the attached picture...In other words, this was not visible to the naked eye, and only showed up when i checked the photos i had taken.

i am a licensed pilot, with instrument rating, and a former amateur astronomer, so i'm accustomed to observing the skies and noticing details...These lights were definitely not visible to the naked eye at the time the photo was taken.

the lights did not appear in any other photo, either before or after the one being attached, so i doubt this was a malfunction of the camera in my phone. there were also no other point light sources in the general area that might have been bright enough to cause reflections in the lens.

i have no idea what these lights were, but thought it strange enough to report to you.
content.summary: Thre bright lights in sky making a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: My lake shore home is situated high above the shores of lake erie.  i was in my home office and looked out over the lake as i often do and saw a bright shimmering light about 2 miles off shore.  it looked just like a bright star when looking to the sky at nighttime only this was in the early afternoon and this appeared to be on the lake surface. i see a wide variety of things out on the lake but nothing like this.  i considered that perhaps it was something floating in the lake that was reflecting the sunlight but still it was so bright.  i immediately looked through my telescope which is situated at the window to investigate more.  the lake had some areas covered in ice and still a lot of water.  as i viewed the object through the telescope it still appeared somewhat blurry.  it looked as though it was 3 bright light spheres hovering close enough together that from the naked eye it would look like 1 bright star.  i know the telescope was focused in properly because i could see the fine details of the ice chunks floating directly underneath this unexplained light.  it appeared to be hovering maybe 15 ft. above the water surface. the light didn't appear to be moving in any direction.  from the naked eye it did get brighter and then dimmer randomly.  through the telescope it did the same thing only it seemed to vibrate for lack of a better term.  it's almost as if the reason i couldn't get a clear focus was because it was vibrating or perhaps because it wasn't a solid object.  i watched it for several minutes and was at a loss for what it might be.  i walked away for a few minutes and when i returned it was no longer there.  a few days later i decided to google unexplained lights over lake erie and much to my surprise discovered many others have seen similar sightings near my location.
content.summary: Bright star over lake erie about 2 miles off shore, hovering over the water

content.detailedDescription: It was 6:25 pm central time.  being january it is completely dark. i was out looking for comet lovejoy.  i was looking east towards the constellation of orion.  i saw what at first i thought was shooting star or meteorite.  but instead of one single streak, there was a line of eight or nine dull orange orbs.  they traveled east, south east, almost as though they were heading in a line from waukegan il to detroit mi.  they traveled almost like a line of geese except they were moving at extreme high speed.  they made no noise.  i had binoculars and viewed them, but still they only looked like orbs.  like flying geese there was a little bit of wavy motion to the orbs as they traveled in a line east.  after they disappeared from view over the horizon.  i looked up into the sky in the area the object had passed with my binoculars and i saw what looked like a series of three satellites very high up outside the atmosphere.  two satellites were traveling north to south and one was traveling south east to north west.  the whole of the incident could not have taken more than 20 seconds.  i said to myself that is a definite "what is it."     about nine years ago while star gazing in winter i saw what looked very much like a satellite traveling very fast in high orbit.  the light was traveling from west to east and suddenly made a right angle turn and went north.  however i can not remember the exact time or date of that sighting.
content.summary: A line of eight or nine lights traveling almost like migrating geese, except at speeds of at least 300 mph.

content.detailedDescription:
Unexplained lights on jan 18, 2015, cullowhee nc
my wife and i live in forest hills, nc (near cullowhee, nc, and west of western carolina university.)  at about 8:00 pm on jan . 18, 2015  a friend who lives about 8 miles west of us called to tell us there were flashing lights in the sky near us (as she had called us on jan. 16).  i went outside with binoculars and saw  a light about the size of a bright star to the southeast of us (at about 125 degrees, a little above the mountain tops, at the location of the light we saw on jan. 16, 2015.)  this light was clear (uncolored), and blinked off and  on regularly as it moved to my right, a little above the mountain tops, until i lost it in the trees to my north.  i wondered if it might have been a satellite.  then a second, smaller, similarly blinking light appeared at the same location as i first saw the other light.  the second light seemed to follow the path of the first one, though not as far northwards, as i lost it too in the trees.
content.summary: Two instances of flashing white lights in western north carolina

content.detailedDescription:
Unexplained lights on jan16, 2015, cullowhee, nc
my wife and i live in forest hills, nc (near cullowhee, nc, and west of western carolina university.)  at about 7:30 pm, jan. 16, 2015 a friend who lives about 8 miles west of us called to tell us about a flashing light in the sky which she thought might be near us.  we stepped outside and observed the light, which was brighter than a typical star, a little above the mountain tops southeast of us.  we watched it through binoculars and agreed that its light was continuous and changing, including red, yellow, blue and white – possibly green – though we were not sure  because some of the colors seemed to appear simultaneously with others.  after about 5 minutes we reentered our house; 30 minutes later i went back outside and the light was gone.  i took a reading from my iphone compass to the trees between which the light had appeared, and the reading was about 125 degrees.
content.summary: Flashingcolored light near mountain tops in north carolina

content.detailedDescription:
I was @ (work)  working the 11:00 pm to 7:00 am shift. @ about 2:00am i left the ###c bldg. and proceeded to the parking lot so i could get my car and return to home base in the ### bldg.
i was half way to my car when i saw a triangle shaped object stationary and or hovering which seemed to be only about 100 feet or so above the top of the parking lot lighting or lamp posts. i could see 3 lights @ each corner of  the triangle object and they were recessed up into the object itself.
 note:about a year or so ago, i watched a program / documentary on the belgium lights and and again the same programming last night 01-16-2015
the object / craft / ship described is identical to that craft except for the red light in the center, i do not recall seeing a red light. i was going to submit my sighting after the first viewing of the program in question but thought to myself what difference would it make. my sighting pre-dates the sightings in belgium. my work back in 1987 was operating 24/7 and was to my knowledge the largest semi-conductor manufacturing facilities on the east coast and was the largest customer of nyseg ( the regional power company) and only a few miles north of indian point nuclear power generation facilities. i had a great career @ ### that started @ the ## ###### research facilities in ######## (######## ##### ##) in 1977 and ended in #### ####### in 1987. i resigned from ### a month or two after my encounter. i was 28 years old in 1987. and now am 56, my life prior to seeing this ( whatever it was ) was on a path to success, but for the past 28 years it has been one un-wise decision after another causing nothing but struggle trials & tribulations for my life. 
 note: i don't know if what i am about to type is relevant, a month or so after my sighting on a night that i was not working i woke up from a sound sleep and was completely / utterly terrified unable to speak or move and had a sense that i was not alone. in 28 years i have had three of the encounters and or experiences these are not dreams i am completely awake and aware.
now after all that i will get back to the object itself. when i first became aware of the object i was excited ( wow thats somthing i have never seen before) then i began to analyze and rationalize what i was looking at and had no reasonable explanation for what i was witnessing. and that's when i realized i was the main focus and that this object had become aware of me, or so it seemed. i became terrified and ran back into the ### bldg. and called the main security office to report what i had just saw, they laughed and made lite of it which kinda calmed me down enough to go back out to the parking lot and when i did the object was gone. again with being relevant, i have had a interest in aviation since i was a child and know the difference between what is possible when it come to flight characteristics of different types of aircraft. i also am a ga licensed pilot ( not current at the moment).Now unless the military or cia had been testing some secret program what i observed was impossible.My question to you is their any information or data on the effects that observing this object has caused any kind of problems for the people who witnessed the  triangle shaped object.
content.summary: @ work 3rd shift ibm east fishkill 2:00am walking to my car in desolate parking lot

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from work noticed light flickering to the south of me.  when i turned to get on another road i seen another light but golden in color that seemed like it was not too far up from the tree tops.   then i noticed the first light flickering what seemed to be different colors.  tried to take pictures but forgot my memory card in my computer.  rushed home grabbed it and went back down the road to the church were i can get great views and started filming and snapping pictures.  viewed the first flickering light for a good while because it seemed to be spinning because of the different colors i could see.  i kept wondering what are we seeing here in our city now for three days right in plain site and it seems i am the only one noticing them.  actually when i got to work my coworkers (2 of them) said they seen the same lights flickering the other day too.  one of them said that it can't be a plane cause its just hovering there and wondered if it was what i have been telling them about that i have been seeing since december.  anyway i turned around towards the southwest direction and noticed a golden light again still in the same area but it looked like it was descending down towards the roof tops of the houses.  the light seemed big and was a golden color to me.  this  i took a short video of as well and snapped a couple pictures and turned back around to see the first flickering light and then i noticed  another golden light and a small plane in the same area.  the golden light seemed to stay hovering while the plane moved in a northern direction from a southern direction.  i would say that they were both around tree top level , maybe just a little higher up.  maybe it seemed a mile or so away in height.  i believe the video shows the tree lines. i also video taped the two of them.  you can tell the plane lights were totally different than the golden light objects light.  tonight the sky was active in texas city texas and if people aren't looking up they sure are missing out on a whole lot of good stuff!
content.summary: Seen three different lights in different parts of sky.  one multicolored and two golden.

content.detailedDescription:
my dad and i were on the glenn highway broke down about mile 87. well we live in alaska so we tend to look at the stars ant night. at first i thought it was a satellite but it was too low to be on it was too high to be an airplane or helicopter. it moved from a hover to about at least 2000 miles per hour in about 2 seconds had rocket effects no sound faster than any thing manmade can go. it made a severe 90degree turn then while it was correcting its self it over shot then it went back to where it started then it came closer to us but it stayed the same altitude then it slowly retreated backwards the lights were dimmer while it backed up when it came closer the lights were around the whole thing were so bright that there was a orb around it about a thousand feet then it repeated it self. i was trying to talk my self out from what i was seeing i closed my eyes it still moving when i opened them i then looked out the drivers side window then i looked out the windshield again it was still moving then to prove to us. that it was still moving i told my dad that it was coming toward us which was the opposite way then it was he said that it was going away from us. the sons story



the dad's story


was with son on the glenn highway truck was inoperable. we were bored so we were looking at the stars we were bored saw a white ball of light. bouncing back and fourth had a rubberband-spring effects. watched for several hours it bounced around in different directions as it got closer it got brighter.And appeared bigger.It had no sound not blinking so i dismissed an airplane.  it was absolutely quiet around us weather clear about 26to28 degrees outside at first i thought it was a shooting star.It wasn't a shooting star because it had intelligence because the moving around to had performed. it
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was acting like a satellite but it moved in a pattern form looked like who ever was onboard got into a fight left the pattern while it was correcting itself to over shot and went exactly where it was to begin with

content.detailedDescription: I have to go out back to smoke,and since i recently moved up form atlanta i get to see stars. i can look up and be aligned with orion's belt vertically. little dipper to my back left. first time i saw what appeared to be a star then i saw rotating lights, red and white. i brushed it off as a plane. but it did not move.That was a few nights ago. i thought about when saw the same thing a few weeks before while smoking around 1am. that one was to the left i  believe south of lancaster county. then just now while outside smoking. i look up to my left again and see a star like object to my left and to the left of the big dippers bottom of the pan..If i face it dipper handle is vertical with me. the lights were flashing red,white and possibly another color and not moving, no sound just rotating lights. i tried to get a picture with my camera but the video would not register the object. i will attempt to do better at that aspect should i see it again. i have heard there was a radar blimp being put up to scan the east coast for missiles but cannot not confirm. i just know i have seen a stationary object with rotating lights on a few occasions. generally in the same spot. all these events have been after 1245 or 1 am..Its my before bed cigarette
content.summary: I have seen this several nights in a few diffrent perts of sky

content.detailedDescription: Rich woods, missouri.  first viewed in sky at dark by brother.  mom and stepfather viewed and took pic and short video.  i arrived next day and we talked and viewed pics.  then at dark could see three objects and later many.    in naked eye looked str like making quick moves.  in binoculars could see 3 to four colors in orb like object.  hovering and quick movements.  later several objects appear eared at further distance.
content.summary: Two nights in a row at moms farm.  parents both dr,s took pic and video.  quick movement and hovering with colorful lights.  zoomed in looked like orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was out having a smoke, looking up in the sky like usual when i noticed a green triangle with a red light going across the se sky. i hurried out towards the road to get a better look i then saw it change direction. went upward then made a loop and shot off toward the south. it made no noise the size of it from where i was standing looked as big as my flat screscreen and it was below cloud level. it was only in my vision for about 15-30  seconds. i was shocked and in disbelief because of the size.
content.summary: Green triangle w red light on front. flying towards the s from se , zipped upward, looped around then shot off continuing south

content.detailedDescription: Weather was bad with lightrain and windy everybodystarted leaving the bridge and a chinese couple my fishingbuddy and myself remained at the seven mile bridge at the florida keys. by ll pm i took my gear off the water and turned around to watch de road. at 11.15 and im sure because ijust looked the time my buddy called my attention to what we had on top of us.  the chinese couple picked all their belongins and ran away. we stood there looking at it for 3 minutes andd then it moved south and stop over the canal and then i got scared because i saw whatscared me most. i told my friend that that was scaring he laughed but the disk was throwing what looked to me like rectangulars one over the other like forming a corkscrew it remained there for about two minutes and then it took off southbound. the next day listening the radio the anouncer was commenting about the cuban  airforcer ion pursuit of an ufo.  next day i told a afriend of mine who owned a store next to my place and he laughed at me and eve  wrotein the wall these words."today my friend tells me that he sighted an ufo last night) maybe he thought he was making fun out of me but i know what we saw and it is real.The phone i had at the time didnt have a camera(it was called the brick) sometbhing happened that night because my buddy never went fishing again
content.summary: I looked up and saw this disk dull orange in color very close to usa chinese couple ran away

content.detailedDescription: Recieved a text message from my 11 year old son around 7:15pm saying he sees a 'meteor' in the sky above his house. he lives in westerville with his father, about twenty mins se of my home in columbus. currious, i went outside to look. sure enough i see a very bright, rapidly blinking light hovering in the se sky. it was pulsing in what looked like red,green, and white lights. this was much brighter than the stars surrounding it, and i could tell by the roof tops below that the object was moving in a ne direction, but so slowly it was hard to notice. i observed this object until almost 8pm, as it slowly got closer to my location. had it been a plane.Or helicopter it surely would have passed by in that amout of time. as 8pm aproached a heavy cloud bank rolled in. i snapped a few pictures with my cell phone before returning to the house. apon checking out the pictures and zooming in, i realised this was most likely a ufo. checked various ufo sites as well as the local news and nothing else has been reported yet.
content.summary: Rapidly blinking light, brighter than stars, in se sky over columbus. moving very slowly in ne path. observed for twenty mins at least before clouds covered it

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back patio. i live a few hundred yards from a regional airport, so i know well what aircraft in flight look like. i was watching some aircraft circle the airport and i noticed what looked like two stars, but they were moving. at first i thought it might have been two commercial aircraft but they were much too close to each other and as i watched, they grew brighter and brighter until it was obvious it was not an aircraft, star, satellite... etc. the light was also very white and didn't have the twinkle that a star does as the light is refracted through the atmosphere. as they grew in brightness, they started to move off to the north, remaining equidistant from each other. the lights slowly faded back out and seemingly disappeared. i regularly see satellites pass overhead at night and the speed the objects were moving was similar to that slow, steady movement, however they did change trajectory slightly a few times until they faded away. they kept in sync in light and distance apart the entire time, which was about 5 minutes in all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two star-like objects, grew very bright in sync, moved off to the north and faded.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog at approx. 5:40 pm sunday, january 18 and noticed a very large fireball looking object in the sky falling towards earth. i ran in my apartment,.Called my roommate to come look, grabbed my cell phone and ran back outside. i first tried to take a video but instead took a picture. i switched the camera mode and took a 3 minute video of what i saw. the object had an amazing looking tail coming from it, but you can't see the full details of it in the video. i'm not sure if it could be a satellite or comet or ufo, so i thought i would see what y'all thought. thanks!
content.summary: Looked like a fireball falling from the sky
